-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of VFW/ACM codecs, DirectShow filters and 
tools. Codecs and DirectShow filters are needed for encoding and decoding 
(playing) audio and video formats. The K-Lite Codec Pack is designed as a user-
friendly solution for playing all your audio and movie files. With the K-Lite 
Codec Pack you should be able to play all the popular audio and video formats 
and even several less common formats.
